title: CHARMING  RANCH  8-9 month lease only Sept - June
posting_body: ['2-Bedroom, 1-Bath Ranch in desirable Centerville neighborhood.', 'Located on a dead-end street, this home is totally adorable.', 'Enjoy your cup of coffee in your large sunroom, overlooking the beautifully landscaped backyard.', 'Great space.', 'Hardwood floors.', 'Washer/dryer.', ' Renovated kitchen and bath.', ' New outdoor deck with lattice privacy.', ' Wonderful Beverly neighborhood.', 'Near schools, train, and commuter routes.', 'No smoking, pets negotiable (with additional deposit).', 'Tenant pays all utilities.', ' Lawn mowing included in rent.', 'Typically, this is an unfurnished rental.', 'It is possible to rent furnished for an additional monthly fee.', 'Please tell me a little about yourself, other tenants and why a 9 month rental fits your needs.', 'Lease terms: Sept 10 - June 15 (dates flexible)', 'Rent $2350']
